price: (Nuhu) aravuga ati “Mu by’ukuri Allah ni We wenyine uzabibazanira nabishaka, kandi ntimunaniranye (nta ho mwabihungira.)”
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَا يَأۡتِيكُم بِهِ ٱللَّهُ إِن شَآءَ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā yatīkum bihi al-lahu in shāa wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna
